channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Ouster of Maduro government sparks celebrations among Venezuelans in South Florida
item.description: Revelers chanted “liberty” and draped Venezuelan flags over their shoulders in South Florida on Saturday to celebrate the American military attack that toppled Nicolás Maduro’s government.

item.title: Trump says Maduro and his wife will face prosecution in New York
Wisconsin judge convicted of obstructing arrest of immigrant resigns as GOP threatens impeachment
